ptc.com Page 11
Tech for Good
While our customers often create 
shared-value solutions using our 
software, we also grant software 
licenses to promising schools and 
educational nonprofits to enable 
them to further their missions. 
The term “tech for good”  can 
mean a lot of different things. PTC 
has adopted the definition of the 
Tech for Good global partnership, 
which describes technology that 
can “help redistribute power, 
give agency to people, allow 
people to make more informed 
decisions, create ways for people 
to connect and participate, 
address healthcare needs, save 
energy, and make life-saving 
information and resources more 
discoverable.”2
